doorbells.name: Ring - Wi-Fi Video Doorbell - Wired - Black
doorbells.description: It has a Camera Resolution of 1920 x 1080 and Works With Amazon Alexa, Ring

doorbells.name: Ring 1080p Wireless Video Doorbell
doorbells.description: It has a Camera Resolution of 1080 x 1440 and a Image Sensor Type of PIR Sensor and is compatible With Amazon Alexa.

doorbells.name: Google - Nest Doorbell Wired (2nd Generation)
doorbells.description: It has a Camera Resolution of 960 x 1280 and Works With Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant and Nest.

doorbells.name: Arlo Essential 1080p Wired Video Doorbell
doorbells.description: It has a Camera Resolution of 1536 x 1536 and Works With Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, SmartThings.

doorbells.name: Arlo - Essential Wireless Video Doorbell
doorbells.description: It has a Camera Resolution of 1536 x 1536 and has a Single Motion Sensor, 110 degree horizontal.

doorbells.name: Blink Video Doorbell
doorbells.description: It has 135° horizontal, 80° vertical field of view and can record and view in 1080p HD video during the day and with infrared HD night vision after dark.

doorlocks.name: Yale Assure Lock 2 Keypad with Bluetooth
doorlocks.description: It has Touchscreen Keypad and no locksmith is needed. It provided Key-free access.

doorlocks.name: Nest x Yale Lock with Nest Connect
doorlocks.description: It is Tamper-proof key free and connected deadbolt lock with a Remote control from the Nest app.

doorlocks.name: SimpliSafe-Smart Lock Wi-Fi
doorlocks.description: It works with SimpliSafe security system and is compatible with smart home devices.

doorlocks.name: Philips Smart Lock
doorlocks.description: The Safety provided is standard and has ultra-long battery life and it is Simple sharing.

doorlocks.name: YALE ASSURE YRL226-ZW2
doorlocks.description: It has touchscreen keypad with backlit numbers that wont wear off and Pushbutton model is available with Weather Protection Gasket.

lightings.name: Philips Hue Fair Ceiling Light
lightings.description: It has Zigbee Light Link wireless protocol and Estimated Lifetime of25,000 hours / 50,000 switching cycles.

lightings.name: Gowing Smart Ceiling Light Fixture Flush Mount LED
lightings.description: It has a Ceiling Mount Switch Installation Type and has a Luminous Flux of 2400 Lumen.

lightings.name: ET2 Hive 8" Wide Mini Pendant
lightings.description: It is made of Concrete and has a Fixture Height of 7" and Lumens of 490.

lightings.name: ET2 iCorona 18" Wide LED Flush Mount Drum Smart Ceiling Fixture - 277
lightings.description: It has Lumens of 2400 and a color Rendering Index of 90 CRI.

lightings.name: ET2 Chimes 15" Tall LED Bathroom Sconce
lightings.description: It is Constructed from steel and includes a metal shade. It also has a integrated LED lighting.

speakers.name: Echo Dot (5th Gen, 2022 release) with clock
speakers.description: It has a LED Display and Smart Home Device Compatibility with WiFi, Bluetooth Low Energy Mesh, and Matter.

speakers.name: Bose Home Speaker 500: Smart Bluetooth Speaker
speakers.description: It has Built-in Alexa and bose music app and also bose simplesync technology.

speakers.name: Sonos One
speakers.description: It has features of voice enabled, touch controls and humidity resistant.

speakers.name: Apple HomePod mini
speakers.description: It has Surprising sound for its size and five colors to brighten up any space. Siri is the familys intelligent assistant.

speakers.name: Amazon - Echo Dot (3rd Gen) - Smart Speaker with Alexa
speakers.description: It is a Smart speaker with microphone of 4 microphones array.

speakers.name: Apple Homepod
speakers.description: It has 4-inch high-excursion woofer with an Array of five horn-loaded tweeters, each tweeter with its own neodymium magnet.

thermostats.name: Google - Nest Learning Smart Wifi Thermostat
thermostats.description: It has feature of Control from anywhere with the app, and also has Heating and cooling system care.

thermostats.name: Echobee3 Lite Smart Thermostat
thermostats.description: It can Automatically pause your heating or cooling and can Add SmartSensor to manage hot or cold spots.

thermostats.name: Mysa Smart Thermostat
thermostats.description: It is mainly used for ductless mini-split heat pumps + portable and window AC and can be controlled from anywhere with FREE mobile app.

thermostats.name: Amazon Smart Thermostat
thermostats.description: It has smart upgrade and automatic control.

Stainless Steel Stand Smart Speaker Metal Base Pad Holder
